name: The Rise of Melon Lord
description:
Defeat the Melon Lord!

Daydream/Nightmare are infinite runners.

Take a screenshot of your high score if you play Nightmare mode, and share it below!

Press ENTER in-game to pause.

Music Credits:
Safe Return | Avatar the Last Airbender OST
White Lotus Raid | Avatar the Last Airbender OST
Tsungi Horn | Avatar the Last Airbender OST
Yuyan | Avatar the Last Airbender OST
Aang Faces Ozai | Avatar the Last Airbender OST
Final Battle | Avatar the Last Airbender OST
The End of Avatar | Avatar the Last Airbender OST
